title: Capstone Project - Animate Modes of Transportation using Scratch Jr
question:
Background Information

There are different types of vehicles used for traveling depending upon the mode of travel- air, water or land. In this project, you will animate these means of transport. Your animation should explain each type of vehicle used in the project.
https://vimeo.com/661786492/0e59e7ad8b


Project Objective

Create an animation that describes the types of vehicles used for different modesof transportation.

Requirements

◼ There should be a minimum of 3 scenes in your animation.
◼ Each scene should represent a different mode of transportation: air, water,and land.
◼ Each scene should have a character with your face riding the vehicle. Youcan also add other characters as passengers.
◼ The character and vehicle should be moving when the animation begins.
◼ When the rider character is tapped, it should talk to the user describingthe type of vehicle it is riding.
◼ The project should be named Let Us Travel.

Computer science professionals break larger projects into smaller milestonesto focus on the end goal. In a similar fashion, here are some milestones for you.Achieve each milestone and submit the result to your teacher.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - scratch - javascript - R - pseudocode - java
